title: LF Top Laner High Plat+ for 5s
body:
Hey guys we are currently looking for a Top laner who is preferably high Plat - Diamond. Last season we reached Plat 1 and am looking to push further this team with some adjustments that were made. We are flame free and try to learn as much from each game.

Add me or post here. Thanks

IGN - aSlayer
